about_the_game:
This Is a Simple, Casual, Relax and Fluency Game.
You can jump and challenge 100 floors to arrive the top floor in this game.
The postion of each floor is generated randomly, which will change for every game and make the difficulty different.
On each floor, there is a coin which can be collected as the score.
There is a save point on the 10th floor per 10 floors, which can save the player's postition and load it.
The length of floors will be changed per 10 floors for adding the difficulty.
The distance in height between floors will be reset for resetting the difficulty per 10 floors.
The game wiil restart if you get out of the edge.
The "Score:" shows the number of coin collected.
The "Time:" shows the total time of game.
The "Jumping_count:" shows the number of jumping.
This game supports joystick.

Keywords and Features:
  • Simple
  • Casual
  • Relax
  • Random
  • Fluency

Control (keyboard):
  • LEFT/RIGHT or A/D button: control the direction/angle
  • SPACE button: control jump
  • L button: load the player's position at the save point

name: Jump, challenge 100 floors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This Is a simple, casual, relax and fluency action game. You can jump and challenge 100 floors to arrive the top. Each floor's postion generates randomly. You can collect the coin on each floor. The length of floors will change to add difficulty.
